title: Sri Lanka suspends foreign debt repayment
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka will suspend debt repayments of debt for an interim period pending an orderly restructuring of debt, Treasury Secretary Mahinda Siriwardena said.
Sri Lanka was negotiating a programs with the IMF  and bilateral support was also expected.
The affected debt would be principal and interest falling due after 17000 hour April 12 Sri Lanka time.
Central Bank Governor Nandalal Weerasignhe said inflows could now be used for essential imports.
